name: Dragon Ash
description: {{nihongo|'''Dragon Ash'''|ドラゴンアッシュ|Doragon Asshu}} is a Japanese [[rap rock]] group founded in 1996 by Kenji "KJ" Furuya and Makoto Sakurai. They were one of the first groups to popularize [[Hip hop music|hip hop]] in Japan.  Dragon Ash is a member of Mob Squad, which is an affiliation with the bands Source and Endive. Dragon Ash uses the French fleur-de-lis as their band logo/symbol.
